text: John Peter Allix (2 December 1785 – 19 February 1848) was a British Conservative politician. Allix was elected Conservative Member of Parliament for Cambridgeshire at the 1841 general election and held the seat until 1847 when he did not seek re-election. ==References== ==External links== * Category:UK MPs 1841–1847 Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:1785 births Category:1848 deaths
title: John Peter Allix
